website_summaries.verdict: A convenient alternative storage solution for your nursery. Install in an existing closet, or attach a wall bar for exposed storage.
pros: This 24-piece nursery storage set can conceal clutter by installing into a pre-existing closet using the rail
Can hang from a ceiling rail for easy access
Crafted from strong and durable material
Comes with 15 quality velvet clothes hangers and six closet dividers
cons: A handful of buyers received with some parts missing

customer_reviews.title: Hanger holding the organizer broke, replaced with plastic one
customer_reviews.text: I like the function of this, but the hangers are used to hang the organizer, and the hangers aren't made for that kind of weight. I had to replace the hanger with a plastic one after it broke. The design is great though. I use the hanging space in between the walls for the clothes that my baby is currently the right size for, and anything she's going to grow into later goes outside of the walls of the organizer. The hangers are good enough quality to hang clothes on, but they're not strong enough to hold the organizer with items on it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael B

customer_reviews.title: I really recommend Delta Children Nursery Closet Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I really recommend Delta Children Nursery Closet Organizer. I'm still organizing the baby's closet, but I'm really happy how this closet helps me to find anything what I need. I don't recommend if you want to put something heavy on it, but anything with light weight will fit perfectly and easy to find. You will not have any problem to put all together. This closet organizer will definitively make mom's life easier. You should try it :)
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Works for untraditional closet
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves the hangers and I like how the hangers are used to hold up the unit bc the closet it is being used in does not have a bar. Unfortunately, the closet not having a bar doesn’t allow me to use the separators but that’s not a big deal. Still a 5 star organizer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our son’s closet
customer_reviews.text: I was running out of space for all of our son’s items in his drawers. The closet doesn’t provide much room without this organizer. Now with the organizer I was able to put all of his towels, shoes, extra diapers, and other miscellaneous stuff in the closet and hang clothes above it as well! I absolutely love it and highly recommend if you just need some more space and want the closet to still look organized and neat.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine D.

customer_reviews.title: Cute organizer
customer_reviews.text: Super cute closet organizer but not really sturdy. The shelves bow in when you put clothes on them. Other then that I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffanie Engbaum

customer_reviews.title: Cant hold weight
customer_reviews.text: Does not support that much weight, the bens are overkill and even putting too many baby clothes in it is a big no no. You can choose to only use one shelf if you don't want it to fall apart or collapse.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Fit great in closet and looks so good
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about this product thinking it was going to look cheap and not sturdy but it’s one of my favorite things in baby’s nursery. It’s not sturdy enough to hold adult clothes on its shelves but that’s not what it’s made for. I put her sun hats, diapers out of box, bibs, etc and it works great. Side pockets can hold small, lightweight items too (which most baby things are). I absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Broke in just a few days...
customer_reviews.text: Hangers broke and fabric where hangers go is starting to rip. I have only had it setup in the nursery for a few days and it wasn't even fully loaded. I see a lot of good reviews so I'm hoping mine was just defective so I have a replacement on the way. Update: The replacement has been in use for a few months, but I am still not crazy about the quality. I am afraid to put too much for clothes on the "shelves".
customer_reviews.author: Tania Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Good product for baby clothes :).
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product hung for a couple months now in the nursery that we are preparing for our son. It's nicely made and definitely has made organizing easier!
customer_reviews.author: kimber

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great in our nursery! Everything is nice and organized. Packaging and delivery were perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the organization this provides
customer_reviews.text: I love the organization this provides, but in just a few months it has started to fall apart. One of the hangers that holds up the organizer has already broken with hardly anything at all weighing it down.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the space I have for the new baby ..very happy with product
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi Mertens

customer_reviews.title: Style and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, cute and functional. Comes with dividers and labels to keep everything organized. Perfect for a small nursery closet.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy L.

customer_reviews.title: good quality and pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I like this I just wish it came with more of the little drawers to put stuff in. otherwise it falls through the back. I tried to order additional drawers but they don't sell this same size drawer separately.
customer_reviews.author: southerngal

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 months of use!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very unhappy with this closet organizer. I got it for my newborn daughters room. She is only 5 months old and it has broke. The hooks that hang it in the closet have come apart from the frantic and the plastic. It is completely unusable. I am out of my return window. So basically it is just garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Candice Case

customer_reviews.title: Keep getting the wrong color!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second return that i have to do to get the right color! This box, and the first box that i recieved were already opened, and in the wrong color. It says on the box that it is dove gray, but when i open it, it is beige. I keep getting beige when i paid extra for dove gray! I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Liyah

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! There is a bit of a chemical smell to the hangers when first opened. I put mine in the tub with some hot water and baby detergent for a few minutes and it was fine after. It’s a great space saver and the color is accurate to picture in person.
customer_reviews.author: n.renee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble While Pregnant
customer_reviews.text: Easy for me to put together while in the third trimester and arrived super quickly! It's very pretty and our closet looks so organized with our little girl's things in it. Husband wants one for his things as well!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Williams

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not functional
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t anticipate this swinging in my closet as much as it did. Made getting things out of the cloth drawers challenging.
customer_reviews.author: beckmspencer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality. If you have very light things it ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. If you have very light things it would be find. I put about 8 swaddle blankets on it and it ripped and the hanger broke. Wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: AmyTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great size
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Ended up buying 2 more after the first purchase. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: 240what

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love it. But the dividers don't fit over my closet rod. And they are a hard plastic so there is no bending them. To slip them over.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina M.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The closet organizer is ok. But the materials are cheap. A few of the hangers have broken already. My baby is only 2 weeks old so I dont imagine this going to last long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cee

customer_reviews.title: Once I added a wooden hanger it was good to god just wish I didn't spend the extra ...
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these in a different brand in one of my closets. I got this one because it has two sides instead of one. I was only using 1 shelf on each side when it broke... The hangers couldn't support it. Once I added a wooden hanger it was good to god just wish I didn't spend the extra cash on the included hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and looks great in my baby girl's closet
customer_reviews.author: E. D.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This has helped to keep my baby's closet super organized!
customer_reviews.author: Cami L

customer_reviews.title: Very nice way to organize the closet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice way to organize the closet. We share the baby closet with our coats and this makes a nice division.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love with it
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect and adorable!! Came with extra sticker labels I didn't expect. Perfect closet addition!!
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Love the set
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and pictured. Love the set, very organized and well-thought out.
customer_reviews.author: Hokis82

customer_reviews.title: Hangers could be better
customer_reviews.text: I give these 3 stars only because the hangers break easily that hold the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. Looks great in my little boy's nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy_Gtz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great gift for the new Mom and Dad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A must have for a small closet !
customer_reviews.text: I love this closet organizer! I have such a small closet for my new baby and this fits perfectly giving me much room to organize everything !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small closet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product! Easy to organizer baby stuff. Perfect for small closet!
customer_reviews.author: Nivea Voltran

customer_reviews.title: Great organizer! Love how you can still hang stuff ...
customer_reviews.text: Great organizer ! Love how you can still hang stuff in between !
customer_reviews.author: Robin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love This Pink Closet Organizer - So Cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the pink color and was very happy that I found something to help keep my daughter's clothes organized considering that we have a very small dresser in her room without much space to put her things. I added dresser drawer dividers in with the Delta Closet Organizer to help maximize the use of the product. The velvet hangers are adorable and I'm very pleased with this product! 💖
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L

customer_reviews.title: Turned out to be very functional... Just what his closet needed
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product it changed the whole function of my son's closet. it's very clean looking and is very functional. I appreciate it that package was what I expected considering many of the things I have ordered online have been much smaller or more minimal then I expected. the separators it comes with comes in very handy separate my onesies PJs and day clothes ( short sleeve, long sleeve, pants etc) initially I didn't think that was enough but after using the product I found that I do so much rotating month by month do to and growing out of things it really was the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Everett's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect closet organizer for a little girl and it has proven durable for 15 months.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this organizer to help manage the influx of baby clothes. Out daughter is now 15 months and we have been using this set for over a year and it has worked great. This hangs very easily in the closet and it looks perfect in out daughters room. We are able to store most of her clothes using this organizer which is nice because we didn't want to by another dresser. In addition to the looks, the functionality of this organizer is great too and it has proven durable. Honestly, I have nothing negative to say about this set, it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Better than a dresser
customer_reviews.text: Great for optimizing small clostes. I don't even need a dress because I have this thing. Look for it on sale or open box. I got this real cheap because the box was damaged. Product inside was perfect. I reccomend buying baby clothes hangers to go along with this.
customer_reviews.author: Mateeka A.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter’s nursery, she is not here yet but im starting to organize everything. I loveee this product i bought both this set & one of the other sets from Delta both of then are amazing it gives it a nice touch & it has a lot of space to place different items. It is mostly for clothes & light items but definitely worth it. I love the bina that came with them , i used one for her bibs & one for her headbands & bows definitely the organization set i was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina Abrego

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this closet organizer. I have had other hanging organizers that were flimzy and didnt hold their shape, so I was hesitant to buy this one. I decided not to get it, but then recieved it as a gift. I am SO HAPPY this was purchased for me. It is not flimzy, at all! The drawers are great. I pull them in and out all the time and they hold up really well. I am able to section off my Lil's clothes by size easily. The pockets on the sides are also great for socks and other little items. I love that it came with hangers too because we just can't seem to have enough hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel W

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for a little over 4 months now and every hangar i put in the middle section has broken about 3-4 times now. I don't have that much stored in it and yet only the middle hangar keeps breaking. I've resorted to using a disposable hangar from the store for the middle section so it won't fall and for whatever reason this is what has worked so far. I have one of these storages (not positive its the same manufacturer) that I bought over 6 years ago for my son that I never had this issue with. And I've also stored so much more items in it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Tovar

customer_reviews.title: Divides and organizes.
customer_reviews.text: The materials feel cheap, but that's what I expected from past purchases of closet dividers. The pockets for shoes on the sides are so thin and one ripped immediately upon putting shoes in them. I wish the "drawers" bins where taller to fill in the entire shelve space. Unfortunately I was unable to use the ring labels because my closet rod is too thick. I still recommend this product since it does divide and organize my babies' closet. It's good in separating out all the clothes.
customer_reviews.author: AAuff

customer_reviews.title: My Wife loved it!
customer_reviews.text: its good but as everyone knows when you buy tons of baby clothes and around 60% he didn't wear, you are saying its not convenient because of the size but it do the purpose of arranging most of the convenient stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: GREAT in husband's closet
customer_reviews.text: I recently organized our walk, in closet. I purchased this to hang on my husband's side! His shirts hang nicely above the shelf areas. The shelves work great to hold his pants and the drawers to hold his sweaters and ties! Thanks so much to those who answered my initial question as to if men's shirts could fit hanging above the shelves! I LOVE THIS and wish I had bought these for me too rather than another product purchased previously. Definitely recommend to those who want to add a clean and sleek look to their closets!
customer_reviews.author: 🌈🦋Victorya💖

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but functional
customer_reviews.text: This thing is ok. The hanger inserts that hold the organizer up are really flimsy, and I suspect I will need to replace them in the future. I suppose if you only put a teddy bear, a couple of diapers (like 2), and a couple receiving blankets and leave the drawer/baskets empty the hangers won't bend. The fabric is also on the cheap side. I also want to note that all of the images for this show it with that two tier metal rack, which is mildly misleading. All you get is the cloth hanging part with a few accessories. On the other hand, the price is pretty great, and so far it does its job.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Closet organizer
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I have an older home, with older closets. The rods in our "older closets" are very thick, and the lovely hangers that came with the kit do not fit on the rods in ANY of our closets. The hooks on these hangers are TINY. As I liked the dividers and bins, I ended up just giving the hangers away, which was disappointing since there were so many of them. Beware if you have closets with thick rods. I was not about to go to the lengths to redo the entire closet and replace the original rods for hangers...
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for easy closet organization
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the closet and the hangers have a suede/soft covering to keep clothes from slipping. I've packed it down with diapers and clothes but it holds steady. I have large width pole in my closet so the dividers wont fit on it, but they are not really necessary. the boxes have a hard base so they stay stiff and fit great in the cubbies. Might have to buy another 24 piece set to put on the other side of the closet for blankets and toys for when baby gets older. Definitely helps turn a bare spare room into more of a nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I ordered this.
customer_reviews.text: Since we don't have much room for the baby's things right now in our house I bought this to help with the clutter. It could be better, but it definately helps a lot! The color is nice and I love the size tabs that it comes with to keep the baby's clothes seperate. The only thing I would like to change is that I wish there was a back to the where the drawers out that way you don't have to worry about them falling out the back of it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh D.

customer_reviews.title: Great for our nursery!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great deal!! Her closets didn't have shelving so these were great!! You can take them out whenever so not permanent. Very cute and simple looking with plenty of pockets and storage space! I recommend for nurseries not so much for adult use.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Marie

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a baby shower gift. Was hard putting together and it’s not very durable and sturdy. We had to put cardboard in the shelves so we could put like wipes and heavier things..
customer_reviews.author: Heather mclean

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love!! The only thing I would change is the velvet around the hangers to cloth but other than that the whole thing is amazing! Baby shoes are in the pockets on the side, socks in one bin, diapers in the other, with space to set out what the little one will wear the next day! Loved that some of the stickers were left blank so I could organize how I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: The product looks great but the hangers it comes with to hold the ...
customer_reviews.text: The product looks great but the hangers it comes with to hold the organizer broke immediately - I had only put a few items in it, they were just not strong enough to sustain the weight. I tried using my own hard plastic hangers but those broke too. This is a design flaw that could be easily fixed - by providing metal hangers or using a strong velcro system or other fastner rather than hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Ari S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE it ! It held a lot more than I expected , the drawers are great for easy access to Hairbows and Socks. As you can see I have a basket with Baby Bath ect and its holding the weight just fine ! And I haven't had any issues with things falling through the back . I plan on buying a few more of these especially for the kids it adds so much more room and everything has a place !
customer_reviews.author: LivinTheWDWLife

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: Worth the purchase rather than buying my newborn a dresser, this makes clothing and things much more accessible and organizable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Organizer!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It keeps her clothes separated. There are shelves to put things on. I use the drawers for her sheets and swaddles. I have her shoes in the side shoe rack! I really love this organizer! It is so amazing. I highly recommend it for people who have limited closet space or who just need want to organize there things.
customer_reviews.author: SAGedgaudas

customer_reviews.title: One of the hangers that held up the organizer broke ...
customer_reviews.text: One of the hangers that held up the organizer broke after a month of gentle use (setting baby items on, no pulling on the organizer). Was able to fix with duct tape, and the majority is hidden by the organizer fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian Sedivy

customer_reviews.title: Completely Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this organizer for almost three years now and not a single tear or complaint . Definitely durable and great for organization .
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I really like this items. It is not the most sturdy or made from the best material but I was expecting that. It works perfectly and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Just right
customer_reviews.text: I like how it fits well in my closet, just how it looks on the picture. It holds strong, not meant for a lot of heavy things but will hold baby clothes and blankets just right. I added two storage bins and looks even better! I can’t wait to start using it when baby comes.
customer_reviews.author: Faudline Pierre Canel

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a long time
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Love it when I was using it but bought this a few years back and gave it away about a year ago
customer_reviews.author: c.27.wade

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are cute and it adds good, if somewhat unstable storage to a closet. However, in our package, the labels were missing. Also, we have had this 3 weeks, and 2 of the hangers have already broken, including one of the plastic ones meant to hold the shelves in place. The hangers appear to be very cheaply made. Overall, I am not happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Quoc Khanh Ngo

customer_reviews.title: This is PERFECT for my daughters closet
customer_reviews.text: This is PERFECT for my daughters closet. I was concerned about the dead space at the bottom of her closet and considered putting a shelf but this was even better. It came with everything as described. After this purchase I bought one for my other daughter!
customer_reviews.author: S.Brooms

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It works and looks cute. I like that there are more options to add to this down the road
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this set,
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter clothes. After I installed it into our baby closets, I can't imagine how organize my baby stuff's on it. Looks very neat inside the closets and cute. My partner come home from work when he opened our baby closets got this expression" Ough..... so cute..." he love's it so do I ( the mom) :)
customer_reviews.author: ImAmommyOfaBeautifulAngel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My second child isn't here yet, she's due in Sept, but this has organized her closet beautifully. It comes with rings for separating clothes with stickers to identify how you want them organized. I used the age stickers but there are others as well. The hangers are magnetic, which is cool, because when they're empty then they stick together and are easier to find when you need to put clean clothes back on them. The actual fabric on one side even has a shoe organizer! Worth every penny, this organizer kept us from having to buy a dresser that would clutter up the nursery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Only one hiccup, one of the hangers meant to hold it up came loose but it was an easy fix by replacing it with one of the other hangers. I am currently using a portable closet so the extra shelves and baskets definitely came in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Chetla Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Average Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality wasnt as good as one I previously had got for my daughter. It does the job but I'm a little disappointed in quality. Not great not horrible. I will try out a little and see durability.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Ripped apart easily.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to hang and looks cute. However, once o filled the baskets with things like socks, ribbons, etc. (All light weight) the supports ripped off the hangers and broke. The sturdiness isn't very good. Definitely don't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: I like how it helps organize my baby's closet
customer_reviews.text: U get for what u paid for with that price. I like how it helps organize my baby's closet. Minus points for me is that it didn't come with the separator like it described and I was too lazy to return it for missing parts. But if u looking for a cheap and cute organizer, his does the job
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Headache Saver
customer_reviews.text: This closet organizer is a life saver. Everything in our baby room stays nice and tidy and everything is now very easy to locate. This is a wonderful product that was priced very well. Another great thing about the product is that it is durable! Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: ... knew only a few bucks could make me so happy today! This nursery closet is so cute and ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG who knew only a few bucks could make me so happy today! This nursery closet is so cute and it made my daughter's nursery closet so organized. I just love it! I was afraid of some chemical smell that some velvet hangers have but this set is just perfect. No complaints whatsoever especially for that price! Couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: JOANNE SABLICH

customer_reviews.title: Cute and useful.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and useful! Pretty pink for my little girl, everything else we have is neutral so a splash of colour it's nice! Worth the money and arrived very quickly with free shipping. Great organiser just wished the stickers worked on the canvas too.
customer_reviews.author: Cocoli

customer_reviews.title: The kids loved it and put it to use right away
customer_reviews.text: I have a brand new grand daughter to join the other three g-kids. storage space in the modest home is at a premium. I presented this closet kit as a gift. The kids loved it and put it to use right away. Construction and function were more than I expected and really met my kids needs.
customer_reviews.author: Traffic Zone n XWalk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for child's room
customer_reviews.text: This closet organizer is wonderful. I previously bought one from Babies R Us for my other son and it was way more expensive and didn't come with all the extra stuff. This one from Delta is the way to go. It's cute, has class, comes with matching hangers and baskets, AND it is affordable!
customer_reviews.author: Krause

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to set up and made baby 's closet look great. And the size stickers helped a lot BC she grew so fast out of her new born clothes .felt good to have clothes and blankets ready and easy to see and grab as new .but I was mad when I saw it at target for a few bucks cheaper, still worth it tho
customer_reviews.author: Twalker

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, useful and cute product
customer_reviews.text: It’s the second time I bought this product, I got one in natural for my baby boy some years ago and I’m still using it and now I bought it in pink for my baby girl, it’s a cute color and good quality, it takes minutes to set it up. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delta Children Nursery Closet Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Must have if you are all about organization. I love this system. It is only intended for clothing and light items though, so heavier items need to be stored on either solid shelving or in a dresser. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: NicoTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: great way to store baby clothes and make more space ...
customer_reviews.text: great way to store baby clothes and make more space in my closet... i just wish it came with more hangers. but so far i love this product. it was easy to put into my closet, looks great, and love that it came with many label stickers (even some that a pre-written with infant clothing size ranges) to make it easier to store and organize.
customer_reviews.author: Kathrine W.

customer_reviews.title: I love this closet organizer this the second one I'm buying ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this closet organizer this the second one I'm buying I bough the other one from eBay but this was better because I get it in 2 days . I just did my babyshower Sunday and I got so many thing and baby clothes so now I'm going to organize my baby closet
customer_reviews.author: Robemny

customer_reviews.title: Works great and awesome space saver
customer_reviews.text: Works great easy to install and holds up well I bought two
customer_reviews.author: Jeepz

customer_reviews.title: A great way to organize my baby's closet
customer_reviews.text: A great way to organize my baby's closet. Easy to keep everything where it should be. Also the tags are good for organizing clothes by age.
customer_reviews.author: Aisha

customer_reviews.title: Cheap - returned
customer_reviews.text: I guess you get what you pay for, but I was hoping this would be a little nicer. It comes with a lot of accessories, but it is soo cheap! I worried that it wouldn't hold up. In my opinion it's worth it to spend a little more and have something that will last.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi.S

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's closet it set up a bit strangely and since we live in Military housing I needed a fix that didn't involve construction. This is perfect! It has everything I need to rep her blanks, shoes, and other odds and end organized and tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan  Lahr

customer_reviews.title: This worked perfect in a little girl closet
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfect in a little girl closet. Currently she is wearing 9mon going very soon into 12 months. I can see this be around for awhile. I wished I had it months ago. Would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: d0nzb

customer_reviews.title: Love it and was almost everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: Love it and was almost everything I expected. I guess my clothing rod is wider than the standard rod. The hangers fit but not the disks that help you separate and organize your clothes. Otherwise I would give this a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Great start to organized closet
customer_reviews.text: Has pockets on the side for baby shoes. Wish it came with 2 more baskets to fit all pocket but picked some up at local $1 stores. Very helpful organization for baby closet
customer_reviews.author: AliciaH

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby/Toddler Closet Organizer
customer_reviews.text: This is the best baby/toddler closet organizer! I now own three! Just got the third one for our third baby! Keeps everything organized and looking neat! Thank you for keeping these in your inventory!
customer_reviews.author: Romel

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I love the organizer itself, but I would change a couple of things. First off, I hate the hangers that come with it. Second, I think there should be 4 cubby baskets and not just 2 since there are 4 spaces that fit them. Other than that, it's a good organizer.
customer_reviews.author: rreffitt

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this when expecting our first child and it made organizing the closet a breeze. Bonus, very easy to install. We loved it so much, we purchased another now that we are expecting baby number 2.
customer_reviews.author: Amber G

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Very sturdy and I love the extra boxes. The hangers shed the velvet material a little so beware of that but I love it
customer_reviews.author: Carmin B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in the closet. Haven't used it yet but it looks pretty sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Sese StJuste

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: The tiered hanging storage are hung in your closet by cheap plastic hangers. I suggest they find a more sturdy way to hang the unit!!
customer_reviews.author: TLS

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for closet organization. Well made with pockets on both sides for odds and ends items.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Better than Described
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it and it has side pocket storage which I had not noticed 😍
customer_reviews.author: Monique Scarlett

customer_reviews.title: but for the price i'm glad it holds anything at all
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what it is supposed to be, only thing about it is it doesn't hold a lot of weight very well. but for the price i'm glad it holds anything at all!
customer_reviews.author: xMsDestiny

customer_reviews.title: Love it works great
customer_reviews.text: Works great and looks great.i have had no problems with It holds up nice.i like the spacer and that you can put new stickers on them once they out grow a size.you will need more hangers tho.the ones it comes with are nice but differently not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Vanna

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks wonderful in the closet, easy to organize with this product and I would tell all my friends to get this for their nursery or kids closet! love love love
customer_reviews.author: Tone Lill Keys

customer_reviews.title: Need a big closet..
customer_reviews.text: It is good if you have enough closet space. I had to return mine since it took all my babys closet space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs backing
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Item would be much better if it had a back that would prevent little items from slipping behind the organizer.
customer_reviews.author: M. Opinion

product_meta.title: Delta Children Nursery Storage 24 Piece Set - Easy Storage/Organization Solution - Keeps Bedroom, Nursery & Closet Clean, Dove Grey
product_meta.description: Color:GreyKick closet clutter to the curb with this 24-Piece Nursery Storage Set from Delta Children. Featuring everything you need to bring order to your baby's space, this set boasts 15 velvet hangers, six closest dividers, two storage bins, plus a three-shelf hanging organizer. Each item is designed specifically for kid-sized stuff with a durable construction that can handle heavy use.
feature_bullets: 15 slim design, flocked velvet hangers Six closest dividers that allow you to divide clothes by size or color
Two printed bins One three-shelf hanging organizer
Spot clean bins and hanging organizer with mild soap and water

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars94 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
